website_summaries.verdict: A great basic smoker for those just starting out. Small size with a good capacity makes it a great deal.
pros: Made of lightweight aluminum, it's easy to move and clean
Performs best at 160 to 165 degrees where it smokes to perfection
cons: Lack of temperature range limits the cut and size of meat that can be smoked

customer_reviews.title: Great - basic
customer_reviews.text: Great - basic, no-frills smoker for the price. I bought this to smoke Steelhead (trout) and it does a great job. I've never smoked meat or fish before, so I bought this smoker as a starter model. The capacity is decent for the size and it is easy to maintain. I've used it during 3 fishing seasons (1 1/2 years) with no problems. I'd highly recommend it if you are a beginner/novice to smoking meat and fish. Happy smoking!
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir R. Golondrina

customer_reviews.title: You WILL use it again & again - awesome bargain!!!
customer_reviews.text: My second Little Chief...bought the first back in 1977; gave it to my 3rd daughter in 2011 & she's still using it! Matter of fact - that's why I had to buy this one - she wouldn't let me borrow the old one!! But I must admit - this one is nicer, with the front loading vice-versa the top loader. But it did the job for our Christmas morning Smoked Salmon Puffed Pastry....yum!
customer_reviews.author: BeenThere

customer_reviews.title: Good unit for fair weather.
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for fair weather. This was my first smoker and I bought this as a warm smoker. It won't heat food to 160* if the external tempature is below 45* or its windy. I bought the insulating blanket for it, but while it helped, it didn't let me smoke when it is cold out. This is a good smoker for warmer climates I gave this to a friend in GA and since I live in Northern Michigan I replaced it with a MasterBuilt wich I am very happy with.
customer_reviews.author: WEA

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little smoker! Someone thought long and hard about the design and it shows. The smoker can hold a LOT of meat and although I was skeptical about an electric unit, temperature control is much easier than a non-electric one. If using larger chips, the element can be turned off once the wood begins to smolder. All in all, a great design.
customer_reviews.author: beezageeza

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a year.
customer_reviews.text: It did work and it was great as a pre-smoker but it only worked for less than a year, however, I did keep it outside during that time. The problem is the heater no longer gets hot enough to smoke the wood. Not sure if the warranty on it would replace the heating element?
customer_reviews.author: SeeNoEvil

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for price - but lacking a bit
customer_reviews.text: My likes are the price, the ease of setup, the size, the ability to add chips with our opening the front. My dislikes are the fact that you basically have to put this unit in the garage unless its 90 degrees outside. Was smoking a small brisket overnight outside and the temp dropped to 72 and the unit could not keep up. works great for jerky and fish indoors without and smoke chips. I ended up building a aluminum faced Styrofoam box around it and not it hold temperature well.
customer_reviews.author: abe

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for smoking cheese, fish, and jerky.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for smoking cheese and fish also making jerky. Works perfectly. All those negative reviews are written by people trying to use this for something it was not intended for. It is a cold smoke smoker people. It will never cook chicken wings or a pork butt. Read the product description before ordering and being disappointed. Great product Little Chief!
customer_reviews.author: linda evans

customer_reviews.title: Unit is fine, but the so-called expert assembly is a rip-off and should be avoided
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these years ago. New one is same as the old, does smoked salmon very well. No problem except for one th8ng. The expert assembly offered by Amazon a total rip-off. You take the unit out of the box, big deal. Then, with or with out a small screwdriver, you attach a small metal handle to the front panel with two small screws/nuts. Repeat with second handle. Any child could do this in less than a minute or two. What else? Take the racks out of their plastic wrap. Another minute at most. The unit costs $98.73. The so-called expert assembly costs an additional $113.67. Come on, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: It's junk, don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use our Little Chef smoker and it kept tripping our breaker no matter what circuit we plugged it into. We talked to a couple of our friends who owned these. They said it was a piece of junk and not even worth messing with. Needless to say it's sitting by the road, ready for the trash man to pickup it up. How disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Easy, tasty results
customer_reviews.text: Cranking thru 40lbs of Coho fillets a few pounds at a time. Smoked salmon goes with every meal. Did need to put the box over it as the weather cooled here. Kept the box resting on the front handle to keep it a bit above the heating element and left the top open to allow heat to dispel. Easy to load, clean and nice small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Ellingson

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t keep temperature, poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Poorly made, cheap material, unstable, doesn’t keep temperature, every 10 minutes you have to resuply more wood. I would give -10 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Adriana munhoz

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and beat up
customer_reviews.text: Smoker was shipped in its retail carton and was beat up. Front panel was bent on both sides and the right side of the unit was crimped. The folks in Oregon who build this cheaply made and packed smoker shouldn't be proud of their work at all. Good thing the material is of no quality because it gives you a chance to play metal fixer. Truly disappointed in this company.
customer_reviews.author: St. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Very light construction, and simple mechanically. The recipe book provided is full of ideas and how-to's. I haven't tried any really heavy duty smoking yet, like taking meat to jerky. But so far everything is as promised. Only drawback is the relatively short cord, which means for me that it is very close to the house, so difficult to keep smoke out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hoff

customer_reviews.title: Extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to use, and easy to store as it does not take up much room. You can smoke quite a bit of whatever you need in this little guy. It starts smoking in about 5 minutes. Nice little catalog that goes with it, to be able to purchase other handy items for your smoking pleasure. Best smoker I have owned so far for the price. There are bigger varieties if you are huge into using smokers often, but this one works great for everything I use it for. Thanks Smokehouse for this reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: SkirrleMcGee5

customer_reviews.title: How Do I RETURN SINCE IT IS STILL UNDER WARRANTY?
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made. My husband just got it out this year for the first time (2018) to use on deer sausage and it will not heat up now does it tell or show you how to regulate the heat on it. ( no instructions) on how to do this. It has a 2 year warranty but; gives you no information on how to return to get a different one. Please RSVP SOON as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesone
customer_reviews.text: Even though it does not cook, the intense smoke flavor is awesome. I have yet to have anyone complain about the flavor this smoker puts out. I smoked 6# of chicken breast all day. Cooked it in the crockpots overnight, shredded it the next morning and then cooked on low all day in homemade barbecue sauce. We had people fighting over the last scoop of meat. It may seem like a lot of work, but it is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: terry ray schooler

customer_reviews.title: SMOKE, SMOKE, NO PASS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best smoker you can buy. Be prepared to marinade for 12-24 hrs and smoke for 8-12. Not for the weak or weak of heart. Buy the recommended wood chips. I will be using this smoker until it falls apart, which will be nearly 30 years from now.
customer_reviews.author: Cochetrigo

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try! Better that spending $300 for something that does the same work.
customer_reviews.text: You have to get this. You don't need an expensive one. Start with this. Only recommendation I have is go get some stainless steel expanded metal to replace the grates. Mine were broken upon arrival. To me no biggie, crap happens. I didn't mind that the book they send is awesome and it works awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO stars
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. It's not a smoker at all. Tried smoking chicken wings, after 5 hours, they were still completely raw. Put them in the oven to cook, and there was no smoke taste at all. It's not eligible for return - go figure. Don't waste your money on this thing!!
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: What's cookin' .
customer_reviews.text: Had fun smoking salmon with alder/ apple chips. Not a hot smoke but steady smoke came out. Used these smokers for 15 plus years. Didn't expect top load for smoker but turns out it's easier to use. Pan is heavy which I like.
customer_reviews.author: jackie fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Smoker Out There
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller smoker but still holds a lot! Very simple to use and quality product. We have used both the Little Chief and Big Chief for years, including our parents' which is very old. Highly recommend for basic home use.
customer_reviews.author: TASH

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to use, easy to store in it's original box. And the price is right! The only thing I would like added are some small holes in one side so that I could insert a themometer.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use smoker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and easy to use. There is no temperature control, so that makes it easy, plug in and go, but because there is no temperature control you will need to get a jacket for it if you plan on using in the winter, as I found out last night. It was low 30s and I was making jerky, it was a little on the think side for cut of meat and should have taken about 6-8 hours. It was in there all night, a total of 15 hours! This init it great for beginners or someone that wants an easy to use smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the $$$!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bugger! Make yourself an insulating blanket for the exterior, and you will take it to the next level. This is a wonderful smoker. It is inexpensive, it works well, and helps me make delicious food that impresses my wife.... What's not to love?
customer_reviews.author: Beech350guy

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker - you'll love it...and it holds up well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for an employee 5+ years ago. She loved it, still uses it and still brings in treats!
customer_reviews.author: FlyboyyyTop Contributor: Running

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use outdoors
customer_reviews.text: I suppose you get what you pay for but they should let you know in advance that the slightest breeze with make it useless. We took a $10 hot plate from Dollar General and switched the heating elements. It was 250w, now it’s 1000w and much more effective.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Low Temps, not a true smoker - it’s a smoke infuser
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this item but it’s been a great disappointment , temps haven’t gotten over 125 ‘F. This item should be called a smoke infuser not a smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Basic, at best
customer_reviews.text: The unit is okay, it does what it is supposed to. The construction is pretty flimsy overall, panels are difficult to re-seat, and you always feel like you're going to bend something just putting things back. Have used it a couple of times, but will likely invest in a better unit next season.
customer_reviews.author: Phil B

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 1973 smoker (that was sold when we moved).
customer_reviews.text: This is a great unit and there have been some upgrades since 1973. If you want a good smoker at a reasonable price think Little Chef.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon Batiato

customer_reviews.title: Nice smoker can’t wait for warm weather.
customer_reviews.text: Smoker door has gap between door and smoker. Customer service said it is designed that way. Had a dent from shipping. The sent me some wood chips to make up for the dent.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Stevens

customer_reviews.title: this only smokes for a short time it does not cook
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in this product. it was flimsily built and did not cook, it was only for light smoking
customer_reviews.author: theresa dean

customer_reviews.title: Get Creative, I Love What It Can Do.
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Door closed for hot smoke. I put my winter cover and frame over it to allow more space for cold smoke. The first time I used it I smoked jerky and Landjager at the same time! Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Front Access Door Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Little Chief Top Loading Smoker for years with great success. I purchased the Front Loading model expecting the same smoke sealed construction. The Front Access Door has a clear 1/8" gap around side and top sections of the door. Absolutely no smoke sealed construction. Very disappointed and I returned it immediately !
customer_reviews.author: lois breck

customer_reviews.title: bad product
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a mini chief which worked great but wore out after 15 years so I bought the larger version which is almost twice the size but has the same size burner as the smaller one! NOT HOT ENOUGH!! Takes forever to smoke my Salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Great Smoker for Fish
customer_reviews.text: My husband has smoked several types of fish in this and it is wonderful! Small and cheaply made, it does the trick. We particularly like it for smoking Sockeye Salmon. If you want a small, funky smoker, this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Soybert

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know this was primarily a cold smoker, did ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know this was primarily a cold smoker, did not say in the description, got this for my son for Christmas, he has to cook everything in oven after smoking, even with the insulated cover I purchased separately and after I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: judyKr

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for your first smoking comes inside except for the brine and meat..
customer_reviews.text: Made two big batches of smoked salmon already, everyone loved the outcome.. I would certainly buy this again.. works great...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT smoke
customer_reviews.text: Tried to use 4 times with minimal results. Folloed directions to the T, checked to see that the cheap heating element is ceded correctly and zero results. Called the mfg twice and was told,"sounds like you did everything correctly including soaking the wood chips and nothing. You get what you pay for comes to mind. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Garylv

customer_reviews.title: Very tiny and cheap thin metal
customer_reviews.text: Metal is so thin it did not survive shipping. It's much smaller tiny v the Amazon picture.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy and Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for small portions
customer_reviews.text: Good for small portions. It's more of a cold smoker than a traditional smoker. Easy to assemble, easy to use. If you want to do butts or full racks of ribs or just larger cuts I would invest in a larger more traditional non electric smoker.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H Van Norden

customer_reviews.title: worst ever dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the smokersnutself came dented up inside of the box but the box was perfectly fine so somehow still packed and shipped to my father for his 69th birthday gift very disappointed and super cheaply made paper thin aluminum
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, but it only heats up to 165 degrees, you might have to cook food more thoroughly after smoking...
customer_reviews.author: Wade K.

customer_reviews.title: Most important thing to know is, this is a cold smoker, not a smoker/cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this is a cold smoker when I purchased. It won’t cook a brisket, but if u like good smoked fish or homemade bacon, this little smoker will do that.
customer_reviews.author: michael rempe

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy about these little chief, but it does smoke salmon just the way I want. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Le

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Just like other reviewers said, it keeps blowout the fuse and doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lei

customer_reviews.title: Very nice products.
customer_reviews.text: Great product make sure you purchase the blanket with the smoker. it is an absolute must.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeWayne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: The chips that come with it make your food taste horrible no temperature control sharp edges on the metal covers and does it do what it was meant for but no control for the temperature so you know that's kind of a don't fall for some people
customer_reviews.author: tessa

customer_reviews.title: This smoker comes with a great instruction manual
customer_reviews.text: This smoker comes with a great instruction manual. It's super easy to create incredible tasting meats. Extremely well made and built in USA!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin W. Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Great first time smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is my first smoker wanted to go small and see if I like it as much as I though already smoked brisket fish and turkey burgers easy set up easy to clean well worth the money highly recommend for a first time buy for someone wanted to smoke meat.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad.
customer_reviews.text: I love smoking meats and fish. I have had 3 other top loaders and decided to try a front loader. Works OK as the front warps when heating and leaves large areas for smoke and heat to escape from the front. A blanket is necessary to make the most of this smoker
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This little smoker doesn't look like much, but it works great
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker doesn't look like much, but it works great! We bought an electric smoker before this and the quality of the food from this one is amazing. We really like it so far!!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Happy to say it produced the same fine result
customer_reviews.text: Grew up with my Grandpa smoking in one of these. Happy to say it produced the same fine result. Highly recommend hickory smoking burgers before grilling, it'll knock your socks off....what a great investment, started off nostalgic but these things have a variety of applications. Its just a very calibrated fool proof design, and it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Regent

customer_reviews.title: Great smoker!
customer_reviews.text: We use this smoker at least once a week. We love it. Makes amazing smoked salmon and pork. Keep the shipping box in good condition, it can double as an insulator for quite some time. Just cut holes in the back where the cord plugs in, and the front flap area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great smoker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great smoker and we make a batch of smoked salmon and it was fabulous and our friends and family enjoyed the results. It is a little hard to clean after. Be sure to save the box to put over the smoker while you are smoking something to hold the smoke in!
customer_reviews.author: Ravenlincoln

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 4 times with great results. If you are looking for temperature control, this product is not for you. It cooks at 165 degrees all the time if you have windy conditions it will reduce the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Fuliberals

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't super clear to me in the ad but it is ...
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't super clear to me in the ad but it is primarily a smoker for jerky etc. Not a very good unit for cooking but would be a great unit for jerky products
customer_reviews.author: Scott Beck

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the 8 hours smoking time produced a tasteless horrible salmon. far better results are obtained in 10 minutes in a gas grill and also buy apple wood chips from home depot.
customer_reviews.author: b burton

customer_reviews.title: Check the box before opening !
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday bashed in. I need it for an event tomorrow, and now I guess I’m stuck with it. The goons they hire for shipping are something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Just used once so far but really like it. Easy to use and instructions for use and smoking are clear and easy. Flavor of the smoke in the tuna came out great. Can see myself using regularly on all sort of products, beef, pork, fish, turkey, jerky, roasts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Use on a balcony or back porch.  Very easy to use.. Can cook meat first and add smoke in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Have been using for over 20 years.. You don’t need to smoke for hours, fish chicken etc in 20 minutes for good smoke flavor.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Although I purchased this smoker in Sept '19 I finally opened it in April '20 only to find a huge dent and hole in the side. It hasn't moved since I stored it in my basement when it was delivered. I bought it since my last one was on its last leg
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Doza

customer_reviews.title: great smoked salmon in no time
customer_reviews.text: keep the box!! this needs a cover to keep heat/smoke in. we cut out a spot for the pan to be inserted in, and just turned the box upside down on top of smoker. works fine like that. also help to store in garage later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lil' smoker!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gift for my partner who is just starting to learn how to smoke and cure fish/meat. Smoked pork belly the other night that turned out great. Love the instruction manual and recipe tips/tricks that comes with. Can't wait to do salmon next!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and discarded my 30 year old Little Chief Electric Smoker and the difference is amazing. LOTS of smoke, fast processing, excellent flavor, easy to clean. The old one was a top loader, which is not as convenient as this design. This one has a larger chip pan and heating coil, too.
customer_reviews.author: George MC Clellan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best cold smoker ever!!! we smoke everything. try smoking popcorn delicious.
customer_reviews.author: isolde

customer_reviews.title: Love this little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Love this little smoker. Easy to operate, easy to clean and easy to transport. So far, I've done 1 batch of beef jerky and 2 batches of smoked salmon. All came out excellent. If you have limited space and only plan on doing some occasional smoking, than I highly recommend this smoker.
customer_reviews.author: rhoadsy

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker. It could have the edges crimped, however, to avoid getting fingers cut on the sharp aluminum edges.
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Riley

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Will not get hot. Smoked 2 thighs and 2 legs for 7hours with 4 full cans of wood chips they sent. Still had to put in oven for 45 mins.
customer_reviews.author: wahoo1836

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little smoker for the price. This is my second one I've had. The first one lasted over 10 years of smoking ALOT of Deer jerky and fish. I've tried several other smokers and the Little Chief works the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blackhorse

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, smoked ribs for 8 hours and they were ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, smoked ribs for 8 hours and they were not even close to being done, Tried the 3-2-1- method, but did 4- 2 -2, not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I owned a top loader for 25 years and that's the reason I bought this front loader. I have enjoyed my smoker forever and can't count the amount of game and fish I smoked and jerked. Little Chief is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Archie welch

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It is a pleasure to use and plenty of space for food. I found using the carton over it when it is on keeps the heat in better. You will make a good choice to buy this unit and the company is great to deal with if you have any problems or questions.
customer_reviews.author: R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Great little smoker. Smoked 150 lbs of jerky and still running great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: this old fashioned little chief is far better than the more expensive masterbuilt
customer_reviews.text: it's not for smoking a ton of stuff....but it works fine for me with fish, brats....etc. very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my old (8yrs) with the same model, used ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old (8yrs) with the same model, used as a "cold" smoker when I can't use my big one or for small amounts.
customer_reviews.author: John zupka sr.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to operate !
customer_reviews.text: Made two different batches so far , Both came out great. Need blanket during colder months !
customer_reviews.author: Ray Gardner

customer_reviews.title: It is a GREAT package and has all you need to get started ...
customer_reviews.text: Ahh – What can I say about the Smokehouse Products Little Chief Smoker? It is a GREAT package and has all you need to get started smoking meats and things. Everything except the grocery items that is. But it has the wood and all. However I would recommend getting the Little Chief Smoke Screens to complete your needs as they really make smoking your stuff easier. Fun times are in store for you with the Little Chief, thumb through its manual and you will see many ways to smoke things, and scan Youtube and you will see many people sharing what and how they use the Little Chief. I highly recommend this as it was highly recommended to me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adams

customer_reviews.title: Just ok...
customer_reviews.text: Smoked salmon ok. But temps aren't high enough to actually cook any other meats in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: M. LEEP

customer_reviews.title: Great little smoker
customer_reviews.text: We love our Little Chief smoker. We just bought our 3rd one. Like a BBQ, they last for a few years of heavy use until the element goes out. Replacement elements are available, but we have always just bought a new smoker instead. We love the size - don't need anything larger - it's not like we are smoking a whole side of beef at once.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Great smoked salmon
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and the recommended smoked salmon recipe is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: efficient and fun to use
customer_reviews.text: Classic product, arrived as advertised. Simple, efficient and fun to use. Highly recommended for beginners or veteran smoking enthusiasts. Amazon got it here fast and in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Wm Mattson

customer_reviews.title: Good little smoker
customer_reviews.text: Good little smoker, ordered it for my father. He had on when we lived in Alaska. The only complaint was when it arrived it was bent and banged up. I offered to return it but my father said he would try to fix it. Great for smoking fish!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This unit is my third Little Chief. The last two were gifts as my original now nearly forty years old is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with condition of product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in the condition this arrived in, if my roommate hadn't straightened it out I would have returned it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little smoker is awesome. The second one I have owned. Just plug it in and smoke!
customer_reviews.author: M. Toboggan

customer_reviews.title: Smoking good!
customer_reviews.text: Tried and true smoker. Only wish is that they came with more insulation for colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Harsh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected however it is perfect for a first time smoker. Will definitely use it all summer. Only minor issue is you will definitely need to be home all day to use it because you will need to change out the wood chips often.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L.

customer_reviews.title: still a good value
customer_reviews.text: Good product, grates are still their weakness as over time even with always cleaning them they will die. So many on the market now that many shops no longer carry these.
customer_reviews.author: Agency Man

customer_reviews.title: little chief front load smoker is awesome
customer_reviews.text: chose the little chief front load smoker as a gift for my brother as i have owned one before and it is an awesome smoker that works well and doesnt take up a lot of space.very easy to use and does a excellent job.
customer_reviews.author: Paula M. Doucette

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the product, very cheaply made with the motto in mind, “slam bam thank you maam!”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This unit is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: An old stand-by for cold smoking. This unit is easy to use, durable, and reliable. I've smoked salmon, chicken, and pork and everything comes out delicious. Their basic brine works for a lot of foods. It's a made-in-america product that has been around for a long time and is still one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B.

customer_reviews.title: I found it to be as advertised. Smaller than ...
customer_reviews.text: I found it to be as advertised. Smaller than expected but that was my research. Spend the extra and get the bigger one. Does the job I needed it to do. Maintained temp as needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made cheap
customer_reviews.text: Pan for wood chip is made very cheep. Smoker is very flimsy when pick up to move. Not impressed at all in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pam B.

customer_reviews.title: Great starter smoker for my son
customer_reviews.text: Great starter smoker for my son. He plans to upgrade soon with a lager model Easy to use. Made excellent beef jerky and smoked salmon
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guerin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as a pellet smoker, but excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Keeshond

customer_reviews.title: smoke em if you got em
customer_reviews.text: I have had this smoker for about six months now it has held up very nicely and does a great job I enjoy smoking ribs and sausage on it. I have found smoking the ribs for about five hours with two or three pans of hickory wood chips and then finishing the in the oven with a little bbq sauce is amazing. Also the smoked extra sharp cheddar tastes redonkulous and helps it keep alot longer. There is a recipe book that comes with it that has some good ideas you can run with. Definitely a purchase I have zero regrets with
customer_reviews.author: danny b the honest reviewer

customer_reviews.title: He got so good at using it he started taking orders
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves this. He got so good at using it he started taking orders. Perfect in every way. Anyone can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron, Angie R. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Smokin and tokin
customer_reviews.text: Its great for jerkey anything else get a better smoker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, arrived in good shape
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed that they could deliver it to a PO box. The Little Chief is THE original fish smoker. I'm looking forward to using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: best smoker ever
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad; same one we had years ago, best smoker ever!
customer_reviews.author: kelsie karish

product_meta.title: Smokehouse Products Little Chief Front Load Smoker
product_meta.description:
Little Chief front load smoker made by Smokehouse Products is the medium sized version in the Smokehouse family. With a 250 watt element and 4 grills this smoker is perfectly designed for fish, beef, poultry, pork and all other game. This all aluminum sided unit has been around for generations and still to this date is number one. Includes electric cord, flavor pan, grilling racks, and smoker.Safety: Smoker comes with UL and CUL certifications. The smoke/drying process is actually two parts. The initial phase uses the wood chips to impart the desired wood flavor to the product, the secondary phase is the time needed to dry the product to your taste. Unplug the smoker when your product is dried to suit your taste or goal.

AMAZON.COM
The Big Chief and Little Chief front loading electric smokers allow you to smoke up to 25 or 50 pounds of meat or fish respectively, without relying on coals or fire. The self-contained, electric powered smoker is equipped with a heating element that holds a steady heat of 165 degrees Fahrenheit for slow-cook smoking. The durable, aluminum smoker is equipped with a maximum capacity flavor fuel pan to imbue your food with the smoked flavor you choose and is vented for proper dehydration. The easy-slide chrome-plated grills load and unload with ease from the front, like a typical oven. With a dishwasher safe drip pan at the bottom of the smoker, cleanup is easy. The smoker comes complete with a Smokehouse recipe and instruction booklet to get you started and a bag of Chips n' Chunks wood fuel in hickory flavor. The smoker is designed and intended for outdoors use only, and requires no assembly.

 Features:

 * Durable, embossed aluminum construction 
 * Easy-slide chrome plated grills 
 * Maximum capacity flavor fuel pan 
 * Dishwasher safe drip pan 
 * Vented for proper dehydration 
 * Non-adjustable heat operates at 165 degrees Fahrenheit 
 * 3-wire plug and cord grounded to body of smoker 
 * Includes recipe booklet and complete instructions 
 * Includes 1.75-pound bag of smokehouse natural wood chips 
 * 2-year warranty to be free from manufacturing or component defects 
 * Made in the USA 
 * No assembly required 
 * UL, CUL, and CSA listed 

 Usage Specifications:

 * Use with standard 110 volt household current 
 * Use properly installed ground fault interrupter (GFI) circuit 
 * Use only on a concrete or other non-combustible surface 
 * Use at least two feet from any combustible materials 
 * Should only be used outside 

 Medium "Little Chief" Specifications:

 * 4 Easy-Slide Chrome Plated Grills 
 * Capacity: up to 25 pounds of meat or fish 
 * Dimensions: 24.5 by 11.5 by 11.5 inches (H x W x D) 
 * 120-volt, 250-watt heating element 

 Large "Big Chief" Specifications:

 * 5 Easy-Slide Chrome Plated Grills 
 * Capacity: up to 50 pounds of meat or fish 
 * Dimensions: 24.5 by 18 by 12 inches (H x W x D) 
 * 120-volt, 450-watt,4-amp heating element 

 What's in the Box?
Smoker with heating element, easy-slide chrome plated grills, electric cord, fuel pan, and drip pan; Smokehouse recipe and instruction booklet; 1.75-pound bag of Chips n' Chunks wood fuel in hickory flavor
feature_bullets: Front loading electric smoker comes with recipe/instruction booklet and 1.75-pound bag of Chips n' Chunks hickory flavor wood fuel
Consistent low temperature setting using a 120V, 250W heating element for approximately 165 F.
Easy-slide chrome-plated grills; maximum capacity flavor fuel pan; dishwasher safe drip pan
Durable, embossed aluminum construction; for outdoors use only
UL, CUL, and CSA listed; no-assembly required; 2-year limited warranty
Dimensions: 24-1/2" H x 11-1/2" W x 11-1/2" D. Capacity- Smokes up to 25 pounds of meat or fish
Safety: Smoker comes with UL and CUL certifications.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
